commitmsg: initial sketch of a server runner for api tests
stub together a server based on hapi with a single route handler and an api loader that walks the lib/api directory to discover implemented apis
stub the api server and depend on hapi
GumbotCrypto.sign() should return a bag of calculated authorization headers
update signing algorithm to follow draft-ietf-oauth-v2-http-mac-01.  the shoe fits
seriously, lloyd?
improve testing prose
document theory of operation for client libraries that live here
add a readme
implement signing
implement key derivation
first test to verify presence of exported functions
sjcl unminified sources as well as crypto.js - to become a dual client/server side wrapper around sjcl which exposes specific higher level constructs used in gombot

Merge pull request #78 from Mozilla-GitHub-Standards/master

Add Mozilla Code of Conduct

Add Mozilla Code of Conduct file

Fixes #77.

_(Message COC002)_
make sure travis has enough time for crypto
ensure request params are marked required
add response validation to PUT /payload
removed jetpack specific stuff from client.js
updated to GombotClient to handle new crypto module for Jetpack using a worker
handle setTimeout differently for DOM, WebWorker, and Jetpack contexts
merge conflict
account creation now takes an initial payload
fix config for docs
parse JSON error response in client
support conditional GET payload; only return payload when client is outdated
update to hawk 0.6.0
added toJSON for GombotClient
added decryptPayload
removed noisy console.logs
added isAuthenticated() method
upgrade hapi and hawk; have PUT payload return timestamp
cipherText -> ciphertext; changed parameter to error callback to be object; returned ciphertext in getPayload so consumers can use it (cache it for example)
Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/mozilla/gombot
refactor crypto functions in client to allow us to inspect ciphertext
initial docs on client api
perform crypto in a webworker on the client
forward port information when using ssl so that Hawk can generate the correct MAC
when the client makes a call to /api/v1/context it will seed sjcl with server entropy
intergrate new crypto into client

crypto: update to v1.3, implement encrypt/decrypt

Added client/sjcl-with-cbc.js (minified) since the stock sjcl.js doesn't
include CBC mode.
add inline install script
only call callback if present
properly set key after signing in
configure authorization to work under proxy
log api routes
fix client crypto and add sign in api
hapi logging
forward auth headers!
add payload timestamp api - closes issue #18
Payload API
proper error format
adjust validation and error responses
avoid undefined emails doc
clean up comments
redirect alt domains
add script to dump alpha test users
only start build server if enabled
forward the newsletter preference from the client and check for duplicate email
fix download button css
convert the key from base 64
Client now working in browser or node.js
configure database for production
store tester emails in the db
add newsletter field to data model
enable unauthorized access to docs
Do not set GIT_WORK_TREE when updating submodules. This should fix problems with the auto build
Implement Hawk authorization and status api
temporary account creation success page
more scoping fixes for browser
avoid var scoping issues when used in the browser
style tweaks
spruce up the pixels
added site images
grab git submodules when building
add a dynamic updates.xml for chrome autoupdate support
switch to real irc channel
fix script argument check
awsbox is no longer a dev dep
deploy, cleanup, and serve new extension updates
fix path to priv key for builder, .spawn won't expand ~
fix path to crxmake.sh
chrome addon repo renamed to gombot-chrome
add temp to dependencies for builder
WIP build server
gombot download link
use mozilla labs menu items
add hybrid of sandstone and Mozilla labs theme
static files can go in public/
add deploy instructions to the readme
use a common config file
Use the latest hapi from lloyd's repo
use relative for views
router should use the magic awsbox port
make couchbase optional for now, so travis can run
WIP persistence layer and stage account api
add router and static servers
remove extra logging
longer timeout for crypto test so travis is happy
whitespace
Use xhrequest library for the client
npm start script
Enable documentation
add a travis badge to readme
fleshing out client.context()
add path to .spawn invocation so node can be found and servers startup as expected
add irc notifications for travis
we love travis
add xmlhttprequest as a devDependencies (as client request library network shim)
implement graceful stopping of running servers, stub out client request api
stub of context api test, now api server is started ephemerally, and the host and port is available to the test harness
cosmetic: remove trailing whitespace
lock to recent versions of dependencies
